text: Aur jin logon ne buraiyan kamayi unki burayi jaisi hai waisa hi woh badla payenge, zillat unpar musallat hogi, koi Allah se unko bachane wala na hoga, unke chehron par aisi tareeki chayi hui hogi jaise raat ke siyah(dark) purdey unpar padey huey hon. Woh dozakh ke mustahiq hain jahan woh hamesha rahenge
